conveyance_obligations: Include complete, corresponding license text for each bundled third-party component in the binary distribution.
Provide complete corresponding source (or a valid written source offer) for copyleft-covered components when required by license terms.
Maintain a documented conveyance process recording artifact hashes, distributed binaries, recipient scope, and fulfillment path for source/license requests.
legal.notes: Do not set redistributable=true until counsel/policy issues explicit written approval and updates legal_approval_ticket to a real approved ID.
